text: During the life of the original judgment the plaintiff, instead of issuing execution thereon within the time allowed therefor, may elect to obtain a new judgment by motion and hearing as provided by rules of court.

title.text: Judgments and Executions; Fees and Costs. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Election to move for new judgment in lieu of execution.
